To the ethanol lobbyists spinning press that there won’t be RINS relief, here’s what @POTUS said: “We’re going to be helping also the refineries, so the refineries are going to be doing much better.... A lot of them...are not doing well, so we have to help refineries.” I agree.

Harry from Hull, MA told the @CFPB about his son’s shady auto-loan. The agency looked into his complaint & forced those companies to refund $6.5 million to over 50k active-duty servicemembers. Harry came to the hearing today because he wants the @CFPB to keep helping people.

RT @ASlavitt According to a new hard-hitting report by @corybooker, the new tax law has been almost entirely a boon to shareholders. 5 drug companies have announced $45B in stock buybacks, while none have announced plans to lower drug prices.

Hold fast to dreams
For if dreams die
Life is a broken-winged bird
That cannot fly.
Hold fast to dreams
For when dreams go
Life is a barren field
Frozen with snow.

— Langston Hughes 

#NationalPoetryMonth
